content: Non-White's Spirit Power allows you to take the form of Non-White and rush close to the enemy, leaving a trail of poisonous gas in your wake. Once you're closer to the enemy, you'll roll up into a ball and sprout spikes from your body to stab the enemy with. This is a strong attack that is even further enhanced by the equipped effect that bolsters your poison and frost damage.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Non-White_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Non-White Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Non-White Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
Non-White's Spirit Power allows you to take the form of Non-White and rush close to the enemy, leaving a trail of poisonous gas in your wake. Once you're closer to the enemy, you'll roll up into a ball and sprout spikes from your body to stab the enemy with. This is a strong attack that is even further enhanced by the equipped effect that bolsters your poison and frost damage.
